name: White Hearts
storyline: The main character Rosaire is the only boy at the Ecole Lyceé Saint Louis de Gonzague, prestigious university in Paris. Rosaire is an astronomy obsessed university student unaware of his potent likability and charm. The rest of the girls in the school are in love with him. They are the White Hearts 🤍.
summary: White Hearts is a Ren'Py visual novel set at the Ecole Lyceé Saint Louis de Gonzague, prestigious university in Paris, where Rosaire is the only male student. Players holding a White Hearts NFT have access to the game via the token gated website.
